description.ko: 투명함과 생물 발광이 고요하고 우아한 발레를 만들어내는 심해 생명체에 대한 평화로운 탐사.
description.en: A peaceful exploration of deep-sea life, where transparency and bioluminescence create a silent, graceful ballet.

prompt: A serene procession of translucent #40E0D0 jellyfish with crystalline bells drifting through a #000080 deep sea trench. Intricate #006994 caustic patterns are projected onto the creatures' membranes, with rising #48D1CC bubbles and fluid dynamics simulations creating a peaceful dance of life. 8k, Octane Render, raytraced caustics, volumetric underwater lighting. Focus on deep-sea translucency and the rhythmic movement of transparent life in the high-pressure abyss, illuminated by the creature's own internal bioluminescence.
